plot: Nail Polish is a 1980's coming-of-age comic drama set one summer at the Jersey shore about a socially-challenged young woman dealing with her emerging sexuality and her issues with mortality.
title: Nail Polish
plot_es: Nail Polish is a 1980's coming-of-age comic drama set one summer at the Jersey shore about a socially-challenged young woman dealing with her emerging sexuality and her issues with mortality.
plot_en: Nail Polish is a 1980's coming-of-age comic drama set one summer at the Jersey shore about a socially-challenged young woman dealing with her emerging sexuality and her issues with mortality.
